data.text: Jisas ne anɨb agak, Yad nɨm nag wayn bɨd ak tek, jɨj nɨm ak nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl mɨdebin agak. Bapi nɨm bɨ wayn wog nap nɨb ak agak.

15.2 Mat 3.10, 15.13 Nag lek yad ak mɨdup ma pulɨnɨgab okok, Bapi ne tɨb sak dɨyokɨnɨgab agak. Pen lek pul tep gɨnɨgab okok, mɨdtep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl kuŋay yɨbɨl pulɨnɨmuŋ agɨl, tɨbɨlɨk gɨtep gɨnɨgab agak. Tɨbɨlɨk gɨtep gek, suŋtep gɨnɨgab agak.
15.3 Jon 13.10, 17.17, Epe 5.26, 1 Pi 1.22 Nɨbi suŋtep gɨpɨm agak. Takaw nɨbop agñɨnek ak, nɨbop gek suŋtep mɨdebɨm agak.

15.4 Jon 6.56, Kol 1.23, 1 Jo 2.6 Nɨbi yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨmɨb, yad nɨb ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgayn agak. Pen nag lek okok, jɨj ak sek jɨmñɨl ma yenɨgab ak, mɨdup pulep tek ma yenɨgab agak. Anɨb ak yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨmɨb ak, mɨdup pulep tek ma yenɨgab agak.

Yad nɨm nag wayn bɨd ak tek, nɨbi nɨm nag wayn lek okok tek agak. Bɨ yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgab, yad ne ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgayn ak, ne mɨdup kuŋay yɨbɨl pel pulɨnɨgab agak. Pen yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yenɨgabɨm ak, tap olap gɨnɨmɨb tek ma lɨnɨgab agak.
15.6 Mat 3.10, 7.19, 13.42 Pen bɨ yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl ma yonɨmuŋ ak, nag lek tɨb sak dɨyokel mɨlep gɨ yapek, dɨl mab dagɨlɨpal tek ak yenɨgab agak.
15.7 Mat 7.7, Jon 14.13-14, 15.16, 16.23 Nɨbi yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgabɨm, takaw yad ak nɨb ayɨp jɨmñɨl yenɨgab ak, takaw tɨtay gos nɨgɨnɨgabɨm ak agnɨgenɨmɨb, agɨnɨgabɨm tek gɨnɨgab agak.
15.8 Mat 5.16, Jon 8.31, Plp 1.11 Nɨbi nag lek tek mɨdup kuŋay yɨbɨl pulɨnɨmɨb tek, binɨb okok kɨli nɨbop bɨyad yenɨmɨb ak nɨŋɨd, Bapi yɨb nop ak dad aplanɨgabal agak.
Bapi ne yɨp mapen yɨbɨl lup tek, nɨbop pen mapen yɨbɨl lɨpin agak. Nɨbi yad ayɨp yenɨmɨb, nɨbop mapen yɨbɨl lɨnɨgayn, mɨd dad amɨl yonɨgabun agak.
15.10 Jon 14.15, 14.21-23, 1 Jo 2.5 Yad Bapi takaw ne ak kɨdek gen, yɨp mapen yɨbɨl lɨl mɨdeb agak. Anɨb ak takaw yad ak kɨdek gem, nɨbop mapen yɨbɨl lɨl yenɨgayn agak.
15.11 Jon 16.24, 17.13, 1 Jo 1.4 Pen yɨp tep gup tek, nɨbop abe tep gɨnɨgab agɨl gos nepin agak. Anɨgenɨgab, nɨbi mɨñmɨñ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨl yenɨmɨb agak. Anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, takaw anɨb ak nɨbop apin agak.
15.12 Jon 13.34, 15.17, 1 Te 4.9, 1 Pi 4.8, 1 Jo 3.11, 3.23, 4.21, 2 Jo 5 Takaw adek yad ak anɨgɨl mɨdeb, nɨbop mapen lɨpin nep tek, nɨbi penpen mapen lɨnɨmɨb agak.
15.13 Jon 10.11, Lom 5.7-8, Epe 5.2, 1 Jo 3.16 Bɨ olap bogɨlak ne okok kɨlop mapen yɨbɨl lɨlɨg, gɨñɨnɨg monmon kumnɨgab tek, bɨ anɨb ak nop mapen lep anɨb ak, tap awl yɨbɨl nɨŋɨd kumnɨgab agak.
15.14 Mat 12.50, Jon 14.15, 14.23 Pen apin adek ak genɨmɨb, bogɨlak yad okok mɨdebɨm agak.

15.15 Jon 17.26, Apo 20.27 Bɨ wog gɨñeb okok, kɨli bɨawl kod mɨdep kɨli ak, geb ak gɨnɨgab ak agɨl, ma nepal agak. Yad pen anɨgɨl ma gebin agak. Bapi takaw tɨtay mɨdupsek yɨp agñub okok, nɨbop agñɨbin agak. Ak nɨm mɨñɨl tɨkɨl, nɨbop bɨ wog gɨñeb yad mɨdebɨm ma agebin, bogɨlak tep yad mɨdebɨm agebin agak.

15.16 Mat 28.19, Mak 16.15, Jon 6.70, 14.13, 1 Jo 4.10, 4.19 Nɨbi yɨp dun agɨl ma dɨpek, yad nɨbop aglɨl din agɨl dɨnek agak. Mɨdup pulɨl pelpel yenɨgab ak pulɨnɨgel agɨl, nɨbop tɨg asɨk ke lɨl, wog anɨb ak agyokɨnek agak. Anɨb ak nɨbi Jisas binɨb ne mɨdobun agɨl, Bapi nop tap tɨtay agnɨgenɨgabɨm, agɨnɨgabɨm tek nɨbop ñɨnɨgab agak.
15.17 Jon 13.34 Takaw adek yad ak nɨbop agebin, penpen mapen lɨnɨmɨb agak.
Pen Jisas ne anɨb agak, Binɨb lum awl okok kɨli nɨbop mɨlɨk nɨgenɨgabal, gos anɨb ak sawl ma gɨl nɨgɨnɨmɨb, yɨp ned mɨlɨk nepal agak.

15.19 Jon 17.14, 1 Jo 4.5 Pen binɨb lum awl pel gɨpal ak gɨpɨkep, binɨb chɨn agɨl, dɨl mapen lɨpɨlap agak. Nɨbi pen bɨ lum awl okok ma mɨdebɨm agak. Yad nɨbop ke nɨŋɨd aglɨl denek, lum awl adek anɨb ak kelɨgɨpek agak. Anɨgepek, binɨb lum awl okok nɨbop mɨlɨk nepal agak.

15.20 Ese 3.7, Mat 10.24, Luk 6.40, Jon 13.16 Pen takaw nɨbop apin ak, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Nɨbop anɨb apin, Bɨ wog gɨñeb ak, ne bɨawl ne tek ma yenɨgab apin agak. Ne yokɨp bɨ wog gɨñeb yenɨgab apin agak. Anɨb ak, yɨp gɨ tɨmel gelak, nɨbop abe gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal agak. Pen takaw yad ak delak, takaw nɨbi ak abe dɨnɨgabal agak.
15.21 Mat 5.11, 10.22, 24.9, Mak 13.13, Jon 16.3 Kɨli bɨ yɨp agyokek ownek ak, nop ma nepal anɨb ak tek, nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak, binɨb yad yɨl mɨdebɨm tek nɨbop anɨgɨnɨgabal agak.

15.22 Jon 9.41, Lom 1.20, Jem 4.17 Pen yad apɨl kɨlop takaw ma agñebɨnep, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak, takaw awl yɨbɨl ma dɨpɨlap agak. Kɨli apal, Chɨn tap tɨmel gɨpun agɨl ma nopun apal agak. Yad pen mɨñɨl apɨl kɨlop agñɨtep gen, kɨli takaw anɨb ak agɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgab agak.
15.23 Luk 10.16, 1 Jo 2.23 Bɨ yɨp mɨlɨk nɨgup ak, yɨp nokom mel, Bapi nop abe mɨlɨk nɨgup agak.

15.24 Jon 3.2, 7.31, 9.32, 9.41, 14.11 Yad apɨl kɨlop nab okok tap mageptek okok gɨnek, tap anɨb okok bɨ olap ned ma yɨbɨl gak agak. Anɨb ma gepɨnep, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak, takaw awl yɨbɨl ma dɨpɨlap agak. Mɨñɨl pen tap mageptek okok gen nɨŋɨd, yɨp mɨlɨk nepal Bapi nop abe mɨlɨk nepal agak.
15.25 Sng 35.19, 69.4 Gɨpal anɨb ak, God takaw ak tɨkɨl agak tek gɨpal agak. Juda kay takaw adek, buk Baybol kɨli ak tɨkɨl agak, Takaw jɨj ma mɨdeb, yɨp yokɨp yɨbɨl mɨlɨk nepal agak.
Bɨ Gɨtep Gep ak nop agyoken, Bapi yɨl apɨl nɨbop ownɨgab agak. Ne Kawnan takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agup ak mɨdeb agak. Bapi yɨl apɨl, yɨp bɨ tay tek ak nɨbop agtep gɨl agñɨnɨgab agak.
15.27 Luk 1.2, 24.48, Apo 1.8, 1.21-22, 1 Pi 5.1, 2 Pi 1.16 Pen nɨbi yad ayɨp wog jɨj gɨl gɨ dad amɨl mɨdobun anɨb ak tek, nɨbi abe yɨp bɨ tay tek ak binɨb okok kɨlop agtep gɨl agñɨnɨmɨb agak.
